title: Oath Keepers leader convicted of seditious conspiracy for role in US Capitol attack
Oath Keepers leader convicted of seditious conspiracy for role in US Capitol attack
See the touching moment two girls are reunited with parents after going missing
description: Two young girls and their dog were found by search crews and reunited with their parents more than four hours after they went missing in Louisiana.

title: US advances to knockout stage in nail-biter victory over Iran
description: • Senegal and Netherlands progress to World Cup knockout stages

title: Gloria Estefan explains why she didn't want her daughter to come out to her grandmother
description: Gloria Estefan talks to CNN's Chris Wallace about her reluctance to have her daughter come out to the singer's mother before she died.

title: A common treatment for your knee osteoarthritis may be making it worse, studies say
description: A common treatment for some arthritis pain might actually be making the condition worse, according to two new studies.

title: US and Iran get ready for winner-take-all showdown
US and China in first South China Sea encounter since Xi-Biden meeting
China launches 3 astronauts to new space station
description: Three astronauts lifted off to China's nearly completed space station on Tuesday, marking the beginning of the country's long-term presence in space.

title: Hailey Bieber says she has an ovarian cyst that's 'the size of an apple'
description: Hailey Bieber is once again trying to make it clear that she is not pregnant.

title: Thermal video shows moment world's largest volcano erupts
description: Hawaii's Mauna Loa, the world's largest active volcano, has been erupting since November 27, according to the US Geological Survey.

title: What Mike Pence gets so wrong about Donald Trump
description: Mike Pence on Monday condemned Donald Trump for having dinner with White nationalist and Holocaust denier Nick Fuentes and rapper Kanye West, who has voiced a number of antisemitic views of late.

title: Watch Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson right a wrong from his youth
description: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson returns to his hometown's 7-Eleven to right a wrong from his youth. HLN's Melissa Knowles has the details.

title: America's gun epidemic is deadlier than ever, and there are vast disparities in who's dying
description: Firearm deaths surged in the US during the Covid-19 pandemic, killing a record number of people in 2021. But as America's gun epidemic gets worse, its burden is not equal.

title: A supertall skyscraper is coming to Austin, Texas
description: There's a well-known saying that everything is bigger in Texas. But so far, that hasn't been the case for the state capital's skyline.

title: Parties in lawsuit accusing former 'SNL' star Horatio Sanz of sexual assault agree to dismiss
description: The parties involved in a lawsuit brought by an undisclosed woman accusing former "Saturday Night Live" star Horatio Sanz of sexual assault two decades ago have agreed to dismiss the case, according to court records from the Supreme Court of New York.

title: Prehistoric giant sea turtle newly discovered in Europe
description: Long ago, gigantic marine turtles swam the Earth's seas. Until recently, these prehistoric giants, reaching lengths of over 3 meters (10 feet) from head to tail, had been thought to be found only in waters surrounding North America.

title: Restoration saves mysterious castle carvings from water damage, revealing new details
description: Conservators working at a castle in northwestern England have managed to rescue some unusual medieval stone carvings that were in danger of being destroyed by the elements.

title: As the holiday season kicks in, consumers still don't feel great about their finances
description: US consumer confidence fell in November as inflation and economic uncertainty continued to loom large and potentially dampen holiday shopping plans.

title: CNN anchors try to recreate iconic 'Dirty Dancing' move
description: "Dirty Dancing" star Jennifer Grey talked to "Extra" about her character returning for the film's sequel, and teased what audiences can expect in the reprisal. CNN anchors Poppy Harlow and Don Lemon attempt one of the iconic moves from the film.

title: McDonald's is giving people the chance to win free food for life
description: For the holidays, McDonald's is giving away one free meals for life. Well, sort of.

title: Georgia Gov. asked if Herschel Walker shares his values. Hear his reply
description: Republican Gov. Brian Kemp of Georgia sits down with CNN's Kaitlan Collins to discuss his state's runoff Senate election between the GOP's Herschel Walker and Democratic incumbent Sen. Raphael Warnock.

title: England and Wales are no longer majority Christian, census data show
description: England and Wales are no longer majority Christian, and are slightly less White than a decade ago, newly released 2021 census data show.

title: Why this Hawaiian is celebrating Mauna Loa eruption
description: CNN chief climate correspondent Bill Weir explains the cultural and religious significance of Hawaii's Mauna Loa eruption.

title: Eric Fleishman, celebrity fitness trainer, dead at 53
description: Celebrity personal trainer Eric Fleishman has died at the age of 53.

title: What happened when a 94-year-old former flight attendant saw a photo of herself at the airport
description: Earlier this year, Gwendolyn Bruhn, 94, traveled from her home on the Hawaiian island of Oahu to the Hawaiian island of Maui to attend her great-granddaughter's wedding.

title: Pope calls Chechens and Buryats 'cruelest' Russian troops fighting in Ukraine
description: Pope Francis has described two of Russia's ethnic minority groups, the Chechens and Buryats, as some of the "cruelest" troops fighting in Ukraine.

title: Will Smith, opening up about Oscars slap, tells Trevor Noah 'hurt people hurt people'
description: Will Smith opened up to Trevor Noah about the now-famous slap at the Oscars in March during an appearance that aired Monday night on "The Daily Show."

title: Three people found sitting on ship's rudder survived an 11-day voyage from Nigeria
description: The Spanish coast guard has rescued three people who were stowed on top of the rudder of a ship that arrived in the Canary Islands from Nigeria.

title: Railway union organizer has a message for Biden
description: President Biden is urging Congress to do something to avert the rail strike that would devastate our economy by causing shortages, spiking prices and halting factory production. Matthew Weaver, an organizer and Ohio's legislative director for the third largest rail union in the US, joins CNN This Morning to discuss.

title: What protests in China may mean for the economy
description: Protests against China's prolonged and restrictive Covid regulations spread across the country over the weekend. The demonstrations against Chinese President Xi Jinping and his costly zero-Covid policy are an exceedingly rare case of widespread civil disobedience.

title: Twitter is no longer enforcing its Covid misinformation policy
description: Twitter said it will no longer enforce its longstanding Covid misinformation policy, yet another sign of how Elon Musk plans to transform the social media company he bought a month ago.

title: Opinion: These are the people winning the war
description: The contrast couldn't have been more stark. Last week, as fires crackled in homes across America and families gathered to give thanks, half-a-world away a dictator sent missiles raining down on Ukrainian neighborhoods, cutting power in his quest to steal their independence.

title: China's security apparatus swings into action to smother protests
description: China's vast security apparatus has moved swiftly to smother mass protests that swept the country, with police patrolling streets, checking cell phones and even calling some demonstrators to warn them against a repeat.

title: Clarence Gilyard, 'Die Hard' and 'Walker, Texas Ranger' star, dead at 66
description: Clarence Gilyard Jr., the actor best known for playing computer hacker Theo in "Die Hard" and naval flight officer Marcus "Sundown" Williams in "Top Gun," has died at the age of 66.

title: The man accused of killing a teen's family after 'catfishing' her was hired by a Virginia sheriff's office earlier this month. Here's what we know
description: Roughly 10 days after a former Virginia state trooper was hired by a sheriff's office in that state, he traveled to Southern California and allegedly killed the family of a teenager he had catfished online, officials said.

title: Covering old buildings in a 'second skin' could slash heating bills and emissions
description: With soaring energy prices, home insulation is becoming increasingly important. But old buildings that fail to keep in the heat are not only expensive for residents — they're also costly for the climate.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo thought he'd scored record-equaling goal -- but it wasn't to be
description: As he sprinted away to the corner flag with his arms spread wide on Monday, Cristiano Ronaldo thought he'd leveled Portugal great Eusebio's record as the nation's all-time World Cup scorer.

title: The crypto winter claims Bitfront exchange as its latest casualty
description: Bitfront, a crypto exchange backed by Japanese social media app Line, is shutting down after failing to overcome turmoil in the industry.

title: Extraordinary close-up images show insects as you've never seen them before
description: The petrol-blue wings of a swallowtail butterfly, soft fur of a giant Patagonian bumblebee, and oil-painted smudges of a ladybug are some of the details captured by British photographer Levon Biss in a new book that documents insect decline.

title: Senate to vote Tuesday on final passage of same-sex marriage bill
description: The Senate is set to vote Tuesday on final passage of a bipartisan bill to protect same-sex and interracial marriage.

title: Supreme Court hears Texas' challenge to Biden immigration and deportation policies
description: The Supreme Court on Tuesday will consider the Biden administration's discretion on removing non-citizens in a challenge brought by two Republican state attorneys general who say the Department of Homeland Security is skirting federal immigration law.

title: UN calls humanitarian situation in southern Ukraine 'critical' as people struggle without power and heat
Why most men don't have enough close friends
description: Friendships aren't just about those you sit with on the school bus or play alongside on your childhood baseball team — they are a core component of the human experience, experts say.

title: He was imprisioned in Iran. Hear why he's still rooting them in the World Cup
description: Jason Rezaian is a global opinions writer for the Washington Post and served as the post's correspondent in Tehran, Iran, where he he was unjustly imprisoned for more than a year. He speaks to CNN's Paula Newton about why he's rooting for Iran in the US-Iran game.

title: UN: humanitarian situation in southern Ukraine 'critical' as people struggle without power
description:
• In Kherson, Russian forces are killing the civilians they once vowed to protect
• Opinion: The one light Putin cannot snuff out
• Ex-general: The move would be a win for Putin

title: Mother of Uvalde massacre victim sues gun manufacturer, gun shop and law enforcement officers
description: The family of Eliahna Torres, who was killed in the massacre at Robb Elementary in Uvalde, Texas, filed a lawsuit Monday against nearly two dozen people and entities, including the gun manufacturer and store that provided the rifle used in the May 24 attack and law enforcement officials who responded to the scene, according to court documents.

title: China's top health officials deflect blame over zero-Covid problems as they defend controversial policy
description: China's top health officials have pledged to rectify Covid-19 control measures to reduce their impact on people's lives, while deflecting blame for public frustration away from the policy itself, in their first press briefing since protests erupted against the government's stringent zero-Covid policy over the weekend.

title: The one light Putin cannot snuff out
US family exposed to toxic levels of mercury. Experts say it's from use of beauty creams
US and China in first South China Sea encounter since Xi-Biden meeting
description: The United States and Chinese militaries exchanged harsh words Tuesday after a US Navy warship performed the first freedom of navigation operation (FONOP) in the South China Sea since the leaders of the two powers met earlier this month in an attempt to ease tensions.

title: Teen who allegedly confessed on Instagram video chat to killing girl told police it was an 'accident,' complaint says
description: The 16-year-old Pennsylvania boy who allegedly confessed over Instagram video chat to killing a young girl told police when he was taken into custody that "it was an accident," according to a criminal complaint.

title: DNA match reunites missing daughter with her family 51 years after she was kidnapped, family says
description: A family in Fort Worth, Texas, has been reunited with their daughter who was kidnapped as a baby more than five decades ago thanks to a DNA match from the ancestry service 23andMe, the family announced Sunday.

title: Victims' family speaks out after tragic fire sparks protests across China
description: A fire incident in Urumqi, Xinjiang, has triggered the biggest nationwide display of discontent tightly-controlled China has seen in a generation. CNN's Ivan Watson exclusively speaks to family members of the victims killed in the fire in Xinjiang.

title: Hong Kong to ask Beijing to rule on use of foreign lawyers in national security cases
description: Hong Kong's leader said he'll ask Beijing to determine whether foreign lawyers can work on national security cases in the city, a move with repercussions for the upcoming trial of jailed pro-democracy media tycoon Jimmy Lai.

title: See family's reaction after reuniting with daughter kidnapped in 1971
description: A family in Fort Worth is reunited after their daughter was kidnapped 51 years ago, thanks to a DNA match on 23&Me, the family announced on Facebook. KTVT's Nick Starling reports.

title: US family exposed to toxic levels of mercury. Experts say it's from use of beauty creams
Retired general: This move would be a win for Putin
description: Former NATO Supreme Allied Commander Gen. Wesley Clark (ret.) tells CNN's John Berman what Russia may be hoping to achieve in their latest attacks against Ukraine.

title: CEO says Trump has 'joined the 'D' list of celebrities'
description: CEO of the Anti-Defamation League Jonathan Greenblatt tell CNN's John Berman why he believes former President Donald Trump has "joined the 'D' list of celebrities" after Trump dined with known white supremacist Nick Fuentes.

title: Balenciaga suing production company for $25 million over controversial campaign
description: Luxury fashion house Balenciaga is suing the production company behind its Spring 2023 ad campaign after paperwork about a Supreme Court ruling on child pornography was identified in one of the images.

title: This couple drove across the world in a Land Rover in the 1970s
description: The #vanlife trend has taken off in a big way in recent years, with countless travelers opting to hit the road in tiny homes on wheels.

title: Explainer: Why volcanic ash clouds endanger aircraft
description: Travelers with upcoming flights to Hawaii's Hilo and Ellison Onizuka Kona international airports are being advised by the state's Department of Transportation to check with their airlines before setting out, due to the ongoing volcanic eruption at Mauna Loa.

title: NASA's Orion spacecraft reaches record-breaking distance from Earth on Artemis I mission
description: The Orion spacecraft, which is at the core of NASA's historic Artemis I mission, reached its farthest distance from Earth Monday afternoon, shattering the record for the maximum distance a spacecraft designed to carry humans has ever traveled.

title: Video: Sea turtles rescued and rehabilitated after being stunned by cold water
description: More than 150 cold-stunned sea turtles have been rescued in Cape Cod, Massachusetts and treated at the New England Aquarium.

title: Pence says Trump was 'wrong' for dinner with Holocaust denier
description: Former Vice President Mike Pence said Monday that Donald Trump was "wrong" to recently have dinner with White nationalist and Holocaust denier Nick Fuentes and rapper Kanye West at his Florida resort and that the former president should apologize for it.
